descriptions:
["DescriptionWe are pleased to represent this fully furnished 4 Bedrooms penthouse with open sea and Palm views and magnificent architecture in the most sought-after locations in Dubai Marina.
Located above the 85th floor, the sprawling 3,179.28 sq.ft Build up area . From the entrance hall entering directly to the very spacious living room complete with elegant white interior, all aspects of the property combine to create an ambiance of contemporary royalty. The property includes four bedrooms and a maid room.
From the living room, kitchen and each bedroom there is a balcony offering a stunning view of the sea, Palm Jumeirah and Burj Al Arab. The bedrooms are a good size with built-in double wardrobes.
The apartment is fully furnished ready to move in.
The facilities in the Princess tower are fantastic offering access to an outdoor pool area and a spacious gym area. There is also a kid's play area, game room in the building and a meeting room. The Princess tower is a short walk to the beach and metro station, Carrefour supermarket and within a 5 min walk to the beach. An ideal unit for end users and investors.
Princess tower is the tallest residential tower in the world, and is situated close to local amenities and easily accessible to Sheik Zayed Road.
Contact Gulf Sothebys International Realty today for a private viewing of this extraordinary property."]

descriptions:
['DescriptionPH Real Estate are delighted to offer this Mediterranean / European style family mansion within the prestigious HT sector of Exclusive Emirates Hills.
With a wrap around garden, bbq area and lagoon style swimming pool, this is really a home to be proud of.
Inside the villa is a double height entrance with impressive chandelier, 3 huge living areas (ideal for entertaining) and 2 kitchens (one of them a prep kitchen). There are also 7 over sized bedrooms to choose from! The staircase and entrance hall are magnificent and there is also an elevator already in place going from the basement all the way up to the upstairs bedrooms!
In the basement of this home is a fully fitted nightclub with disco lights and DJ set for those who like to entertain. Alternatively, if this is not your style- the space can easily be transformed into a home cinema.
This property has been reduced recently and is priced at land cost only. This is certainly one of the nicest, and most sensibly priced houses on the market today.
For viewings call Myles on +971509501897 or EMAIL mb@phrealestate.ae']

amenities:
['Unfurnished
Central A/C
Private Pool
Security']
descriptions:
['DescriptionPH Real Estate is delighted to offer this exclusive family home located in the preferred  ‘P’ Sector of Emirates Hills.
The villa sits on a plot of approximately 17,000 sq. ft. of prime, lake facing land with all of the main living rooms facing the water.
To the front of the property is a sweeping driveway and plenty of space for parking. To the rear a wonderful bbq/entertaining space along with swimming pool, both of which face the lake.
The home itself is classically built with a double width staircase, marble flooring, and large living areas. There are 5 spacious Bedrooms (space to build a 6th) – all of which have private en suite bathrooms.
Downstairs, the intelligent floor plan means that all of the major living areas (family living /dining and kitchen) all face the lake. There is also a second industry kitchen along with staff accommodation.   
This home has been priced to sell and is exclusively listed with PH Real Estate. Interested buyers and brokers, are invited for viewings.
Contact Myles on +971509501897 or EMAIL mb@phrealestate.ae']
